entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11.
